#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
	ll e,o,req,t,ans;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&e,&o);
		if((e+o)%5==0)
		{
			req=2*(e+o)/5;
			ans=e-req;
			if(ans<0)
				ans=-ans;
			printf("%lld\n",ans);
		}
		else
			printf("-1\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
